MAXIMUM FUNK

AMPLIFIED FUNK pulls from the music sensation that injected The Groove into popular music culture Ã¢â‚¬â€œ custom designed by funk and soul specialist Amp Fiddler.

GROOVE ANTHOLOGY

Get lost in the true spirit of funk. Created by the prolific producer who worked with legends including George Clinton and Parliament/Funkadelic, AMPLIFIED FUNK is packed with custom samples of guitar and bass licks, chords, vintage keys and synths, pianos, percussion, vocals, and more. Electronic instrument samples add a contemporary edge for modern producers, and exclusive presets for MASSIVE and the MASCHINE Drum Synths wrap 30 years of music into one funked-up expansion.

PUTTING IT TOGETHER

Funk and soul specialist Amp Fiddler compiled all the live samples for AMPLIFIED FUNK in his Camp Amp studio. Among the sampled instruments were vintage drums, a vintage Roland Jupiter-6 and Moog Memorymoog, and a baby grand piano. Instrumentalists recorded for the session include guitarist Chris Bruce, and members of Funkadelic, guitarist Andre Ã¢â‚¬ËœFoxÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Williams and percussionist Larry Fratangelo. To add a contemporary edge, Amp also created custom sounds with MASSIVE and the MASCHINE Drum Synths.
